column4: Hey Guys. I've set up a *nix social networking site. It's designed a bit like twitter/facebook but for Linux users. I spent quite a long time on it. Anyone who wants to visit can go to www.nixpak.com
sorry not inteded as spam, i just wanted to show off a project
wow guys no need to be so rude I wasn't adertising, just wanted to show off some work i've been up to
No worries.  Just please take it to #ubuntu-offtopic, we prefer to keep this channel support only.  Thanks.
